alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 6:48PM EDT until June 22 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL LEWIS AND SOUTHERN SCIOTO COUNTIES... At 648 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from South Shore to near Camp Dix to 6 miles west of Head of Grassy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Sciotodale, Franklin Furnace, Rosemount, Saint Paul, Firebrick, Harris, Kinniconick, Tannery, Emerson, Friendship, Powellsville, Garrison, Petersville, Stricklett and Lyra. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
